feed.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3

entry.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3
entry.summary: Matt Corallo has announced on the Bitcoin development mailing list that Wallet Encryption is now in a pull-able state. He submitted the update after a lot of good discussion and a tiny bit of results. The code has been rebased onto wallet class and is ready for "wtf is this crap" messages. The link to the pull request on GitHub has also been provided.
